input.system: You are a helpful assistant providing information about space missions.

items.expected_output: Apollo 11 was the first mission to land humans on the Moon in 1969. Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin walked on the lunar surface.

input.system: You are an expert in world history.
input.user: Who was the first President of the USA?

items.expected_output: The first President of the USA was George Washington, serving from 1789 to 1797.
